OOC: Dewboy, the cloud encompasses the area all around thirst and where 
thirst isnt is Hugars charachters. heh theres no escape. You did soemthing 
dumb. Introduce a hostile charachter on someone elses ship and tried doing 
stuff to it without their permission. Thirst has no escape. He is blocked 
from all escape, the end is inevitable.

IC: As Thirst lepped out of the cloud the acid was still on him, that is what 
the cloud was made of. A second before thirst reached rights neck, void 
lunged forward and slammed a claw into Thirsts back and then gdragged him 
back before slamming him into the ground. 


--part1_13d.8c11689.298e029e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
